text:
As our scientists work on a COVID-19 vaccine, this is no time for the President’s anti-science agenda. Fetal tissue is the gold standard of vaccine research, yet the Trump Admin refuses to lift its ban!

Read my statement on the Admin’s dangerous position, which could cost lives. https://t.co/Uz0s9fvc4S
